example uh whose effects I I
underestimated um was simply because I
felt as a writer I could not write with
Integrity about the subject without

had
experienced I wrote about it h before

1990 and I became positive in 1993
three
um I I don't believe as a writer in this
day and age a gay man had any option but
to be completely open I felt that was a
moral
responsibility it was a particularly a
moral
responsibility when my brothers were
were dying in so many so great numbers
but it was also a responsibility to
myself to live a
life and not be a liar not to to have
integrity as a human being and it took a
long time but I was really almost never
in the
closet I just refused to deal with it
and to talk about it I never denied it
because of my Catholic upbringing in
faith which was an extraordinary
difficult struggle
